name: Tides Of Glory
blurb: Trade and fight your way across the high seas as you change the balance of power in this swash buckling, twitch based MMO for mobile.

rewards.reward: Sea Dog (Updated) =========================== Support our game! Get that feel good glow and our eternal gratitude, as well as an ADD FREE version of the game and special access to the Tides Of Glory forum \u2013 with exclusive peaks at screenshots/ concept art/ game updates before anybody else.

Sea Dog\r\n===========================\r\nSupport our game! Get that feel good glow and our eternal gratitude, as well as special access to the Tides Of Glory forum \u2013 with exclusive peaks at screenshots/ concept art/ game updates before anybody else.
Boatswain\r\n===========================\r\nEverything from the \u00a35 tier as well as an ad free version of the game itself. We\u2019ll also give you special thanks in the credits.

Boatswain (Updated) =========================== Everything from the \u00a35 tier plus a KickStarter pack for your ship, show everyone in game that you supported Tides Of Glory in its time of need. We\u2019ll also give you special thanks in the credits.

First Mate\r\n===========================\r\nEverything from the \u00a310 tier, as well as access to an early alpha version of the game, giving you the chance to provide feedback and directly affect the final game. We\u2019ll also send you a digital copy of the world map.

Quartermaster\r\n===========================\r\nEverything from the \u00a315 tier, as well as a whole bundle of HD concept art, and a starter pack of in game assets \u2013 all people you meet in the game know you helped make this game happen.
Pirate Captain\r\n===========================\r\nEverything from the \u00a325 tier, but instead of just an ad free version of the game \u2013 you\u2019ll receive a lifetime premium account!
Ship\u2019s Captain \r\n===========================\r\nEverything from the \u00a350 tier, we\u2019ll also name an NPC after you or a loved one, and give your player character a personalised title.

Dread Pirate\r\n===========================\r\nEverything from the \u00a380 tier, as well as an exclusive Dread Pirate Kickstarter pack including a special ship unavailable in game. We\u2019ll also mention you in the credits as a \u2018Game Supporter.\u2019

Admiral\r\n===========================\r\nEverything from the \u00a3100 tier, as well as a port in the game named after you. We\u2019ll also send you some signed concept art and put you in the credits as an \u2018Executive producer.\u2019

Grand Admiral\r\n=========================== \r\nEverything from the Dread Pirate tier plus you get to be immortalised as a character in the game, your face or a loved ones face used as a shop keeper, bartender, lowly tavern dweller. You will also receive a signed copy by post.

Pirate King\r\n===========================\r\nAll previous tiers plus a bundle of prizes fit for a Pirate King; you\u2019ll be able to appear as an important character in the game itself! If you send us a picture of you or a loved one we\u2019ll transform you into a VIP non player character such as a port governor or navy admiral. We\u2019ll even send you the signed original artwork of character artwork for you to put up on your wall, as well as a signed book of concept art.

Ruler of the Open Sea\r\n===========================\r\nThe mother of all bundles! You\u2019ll receive everything already mentioned, but you\u2019ll actually be able to choose a number of character traits for the character created in the \u00a3300 pledge, as well as their status and allegiance. We\u2019ll also provide you your own galleon model to place on your desk. What\u2019s more, all the physical items will be delivered in a very special collector\u2019s edition treasure chest.
